languages.text: "Назови мне хотя бы одну причину проявить снисхождение к этому ничтожному изменнику".
"Give me one reason why I should show lenience to this wretched traitor."
languages.original_text: "Назови мне хотя бы одну причину проявить снисхождение к этому ничтожному изменнику".

traits.locale_text: "Give me one reason I should be lenient to this wretched traitor."
"Give me one reason I should be lenient to this wretched traitor."
"Give me one reason I should be lenient to this wretched traitor."
"Give me one reason I should be lenient to this wretched traitor."
"Give me one reason why I should show lenience to this wretched traitor."
"Give me one reason why I should show lenience to this wretched traitor."

languages.text: “我为什么要对这个邪恶的叛徒手下留情？给我个理由吧。”
languages.original_text: "Give me one reason why I should show lenience to this wretched traitor."

traits.locale_text: “我为什么要对这个邪恶的叛徒手下留情？给我个理由吧。”

languages.text: 「この惨めな裏切り者に甘くする理由などあるのか？」
languages.original_text: "Give me one reason why I should show lenience to this wretched traitor."

traits.locale_text: 「この裏切り者に甘くする理由などあるのか？」

languages.text: «Deme una razón por la que debería ser indulgente con este miserable traidor».
languages.original_text: "Give me one reason why I should show lenience to this wretched traitor."

traits.locale_text: «Deme una razón por la que debería ser indulgente con este miserable traidor».

languages.text: "Nennt mir einen Grund, warum ich diesem verräterischen Abschaum Gnade gewähren sollte."
languages.original_text: "Give me one reason why I should show lenience to this wretched traitor."

traits.locale_text: "Nennt mir einen Grund, warum ich diesem verräterischen Abschaum Gnade gewähren sollte."

languages.text: « Donnez-moi une seule raison de me montrer magnanime envers ce maudit traître. »
languages.original_text: "Give me one reason why I should show lenience to this wretched traitor."

traits.locale_text: « Donnez-moi une seule bonne raison de me montrer magnanime envers ce maudit traître. »

languages.text: "Bu aşağılık haine hoşgörü göstermem için bana tek bir sebep söyle."
languages.original_text: "Give me one reason why I should show lenience to this wretched traitor."

traits.locale_text: "Bu aşağılık haine hoşgörü göstermem için bana tek bir sebep söyle."
